name: brief-1
description:
Simple Calculator in Node.js

Objective

This project is a simple calculator built using Node.js. It is designed to perform basic mathematical operations while showcasing key JavaScript object-oriented programming concepts and introducing error handling principles.

Features

  • Perform addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
  • Use of classes and objects to structure the calculator logic.
  • Error handling for invalid input, division by zero, and unsupported operations.

Technologies Used

  • Node.js: JavaScript runtime used to run the application.
  • JavaScript (ES6): Used for object-oriented programming concepts such as classes and methods.
